DOC.brief_summary: Automated external defibrillator improve survival adult hospital cardiac arrest . Automated external defibrillator approve child age 1 year old hospital cardiac arrest . It unknown whether automated external defibrillator role hospital pediatric cardiac arrest . The purpose study compare management cardiac rhythm disorder pediatric resident use automated external defibrillator versus standard defibrillator simulate pediatric cardiac arrest . It hypothesis resident use automated external defibrillator shorter time defibrillation .
DOC.brief_title: Time Defibrillation Using Automated External Defibrillators Pediatric Residents Simulated Cardiac Arrests
DOC.criteria: Pediatric resident Baylor College Medicine Not pediatric resident Baylor College Medicine
